languages.text: "Шутить изволите, Лорд-капитан? Чернь подла и всегда замышляет бунт. Воруют все, до чего дотянутся, а в последнее время от сухпайков и консервов уже на оружие перешли! Конечно, мы его регулярно изымаем, а серфов держим в ужасе и подобострастии. Ведь только так тупую скотину и можно от самой себя защитить".

traits.locale_text: "Шутить изволите, Лорд-капитан? Чернь подла и всегда замышляет бунт. Воруют все, до чего дотянутся, а в последнее время от сухпайков и консервов уже на оружие перешли! Конечно, мы его регулярно изымаем, а серфов держим в ужасе и подобострастии. Ведь только так тупую скотину и можно от самой себя защитить".

languages.text: "Surely you are joking, Lord Captain? The rabble are base in nature, and mutiny is always on their minds. They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and lately they've moved from rations and tinned food to weapons. We confiscate these regularly, of course, and keep the serfs meek and terrified. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."
languages.original_text: "Шутить изволите, Лорд-капитан? Чернь подла и всегда замышляет бунт. Воруют все, до чего дотянутся, а в последнее время от сухпайков и консервов уже на оружие перешли! Конечно, мы его регулярно изымаем, а серфов держим в ужасе и подобострастии. Ведь только так тупую скотину и можно от самой себя защитить".

traits.locale_text: "Surely you are joking, Lord Captain? The rabble are base in nature, and mutiny is always on their minds. They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and lately they've moved from rations and tinned food to weapons. We confiscate these regularly, of course, and keep the serfs meek and terrified. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."

"Surely you're joking, Lord Captain, {mf|sir|ma'am}? The rabble's nature is base and mutiny is always on their minds. They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and of late, they've gone from rations and tinned food to weapons! Of course we confiscate those regularly and keep the serfs meek and terrified. For that's the only way we can protect the dumb brutes from themselves."

"Surely you're joking, Lord Captain, {mf|sir|ma'am}? The rabble are base in nature, and mutiny is always on their minds. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."

They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and lately they've moved from rations and tinned food to weapons. We confiscate these regularly, of course, and keep the serfs meek and terrified. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."

They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and lately they've moved from rations and tinned food to weapons. We confiscate these regularly, of course, and keep the serfs meek and terrified. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."

languages.text: «¿Bromea, Lord Capitán? La turba es de naturaleza vulgar y el motín siempre está en su mente. Roban todo lo que pueden, y últimamente han pasado de raciones y comida enlatada a armas. Las confiscamos con regularidad, claro, y mantenemos a los siervos dóciles y aterrados. Es lo único que podemos hacer para proteger al rebaño descerebrado de sí mismo».
languages.original_text: "Surely you are joking, Lord Captain? The rabble are base in nature, and mutiny is always on their minds. They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and lately they've moved from rations and tinned food to weapons. We confiscate these regularly, of course, and keep the serfs meek and terrified. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."

traits.locale_text: «¿Bromea, Lord Capitán? La turba es de naturaleza vulgar y el motín siempre está en su mente. Roban todo lo que pueden, y últimamente han pasado de raciones y comida enlatada a armas. Las confiscamos con regularidad, claro, y mantenemos a los siervos dóciles y aterrados. Es lo único que podemos hacer para proteger al rebaño descerebrado de sí mismo».

languages.text: 「ご冗談ですよね、ロード・キャプテン？暴徒は本質的に卑しく、常に反乱のことばかり考えているのです。触れられるものは何でも盗む。最近では配給品や缶詰から武器に移ってきています。もちろん、そういうものは定期的に没収し、濃度どもを従順にさせ、怯えさせております。それが思考能力を持たない群れを自身から守らせる唯一の方法なのです」
languages.original_text: "Surely you are joking, Lord Captain? The rabble are base in nature, and mutiny is always on their minds. They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and lately they've moved from rations and tinned food to weapons. We confiscate these regularly, of course, and keep the serfs meek and terrified. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「ご冗談ですよね、ロード・キャプテン？暴徒は本質的に卑しく、常に反乱のことばかり考えているのです。触れられるものは何でも盗む。最近では配給品や缶詰から武器に移ってきています。もちろん、そういうものは定期的に没収し、濃度どもを従順にさせ、怯えさせております。それが思考能力を持たない群れを自身から守らせる唯一の方法なのです」

languages.text: “您这应该是在开玩笑吧，舰长大人？那些卑劣的乌合之众本性难改。他们脑子里天天想着造反，看到什么东西就偷什么东西。前一阵子是偷口粮和罐装食品，最近又开始偷武器了。当然，我们会定期没收这些东西，让那些仆人始终保持温顺，心怀恐惧。只有这样，才能保护那群没脑子的东西，让他们不要害了自己。”
languages.original_text: "Surely you are joking, Lord Captain? The rabble are base in nature, and mutiny is always on their minds. They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and lately they've moved from rations and tinned food to weapons. We confiscate these regularly, of course, and keep the serfs meek and terrified. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."

traits.locale_text: “您这应该是在开玩笑吧，舰长大人？那些卑劣的乌合之众本性难改。他们脑子里天天想着造反，看到什么东西就偷什么东西。前一阵子是偷口粮和罐装食品，最近又开始偷武器了。当然，我们会定期没收这些东西，让那些仆人始终保持温顺，心怀恐惧。只有这样，才能保护那群没脑子的东西，让他们不要害了自己。”

languages.text: "Ihr beliebt zu scherzen, Lord Captain. Meuterei ist für das Gesindel immer eine Option. Sie stehlen, was sie können und haben ihr Hauptaugenmerk neuerdings von Rationen und Dosenfleisch auf Waffen verlegt. Wir konfiszieren sie natürlich in regelmäßigen Abständen und halten die Leute in ständiger Angst. Nur so können wir die hirnlose Herde vor sich selbst schützen."
languages.original_text: "Surely you are joking, Lord Captain? The rabble are base in nature, and mutiny is always on their minds. They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and lately they've moved from rations and tinned food to weapons. We confiscate these regularly, of course, and keep the serfs meek and terrified. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr beliebt zu scherzen, Lord Captain. Meuterei ist für das Gesindel immer eine Option. Sie stehlen, was sie können und haben ihr Hauptaugenmerk neuerdings von Rationen und Dosenfleisch auf Waffen verlegt. Wir konfiszieren sie natürlich in regelmäßigen Abständen und halten die Leute in ständiger Angst. Nur so können wir die hirnlose Herde vor sich selbst schützen."

languages.text: « Vous plaisantez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Ces gens sont des sauvages qui n'ont que la mutinerie à l'esprit. Ils volent tout ce qui leur tombe sous la main. Autant, avant, ils se contentaient de rations et de conserves, autant, ces derniers temps, ils semblent avoir un plus grand penchant pour les armes. Nous confisquons toutes celles que nous trouvons, bien sûr, et faisons régner la terreur pour rendre ces misérables plus dociles. Après tout, c'est la seule façon de les protéger de leur propre stupidité. »
languages.original_text: "Surely you are joking, Lord Captain? The rabble are base in nature, and mutiny is always on their minds. They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and lately they've moved from rations and tinned food to weapons. We confiscate these regularly, of course, and keep the serfs meek and terrified. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Vous plaisantez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Ces gens sont des sauvages qui n'ont que la mutinerie à l'esprit. Ils volent tout ce qui leur tombe sous la main. Autant, avant, ils se contentaient de rations et de conserves, autant, ces derniers temps, ils semblent avoir un plus grand penchant pour les armes. Nous confisquons toutes celles que nous trouvons, bien sûr, et faisons régner la terreur pour rendre ces misérables plus dociles. Après tout, c'est la seule façon de les protéger de leur propre stupidité. »

languages.text: "Herhâlde şaka yapıyorsunuz Lord Kaptan. Ayaktakımı, tabiatı gereği alçaklardan oluşur ve o alçakların zihinlerinin bir köşesinde her daim isyan vardır. Ellerine geçen her şeyi çalarlar. Son zamanlardaysa kumanya ve konserve yiyecek çalmaktan silaha terfi ettiler. Tabii ki bunlara düzenli olarak el koyuyoruz. Kölelerin de itaatkâr korkaklar olarak kalmalarını sağlıyoruz. O beyinsiz sürüyü kendinden korumamızın tek yolu bu."
languages.original_text: "Surely you are joking, Lord Captain? The rabble are base in nature, and mutiny is always on their minds. They steal whatever they can get their hands on, and lately they've moved from rations and tinned food to weapons. We confiscate these regularly, of course, and keep the serfs meek and terrified. That's the only way we can protect the mindless herd from themselves."
